attributeList.name: availability
attributeList.description: When is the system operational for use?  Are certain time periods restricted for activities such as batch processing, system upgrades, backups, etc.  Would the system function in a limited functionality or capacity in such situations?

attributeList.name: maintainability
attributeList.description: if the organization intends to increase or extend the functionality of the software after it is deployed, that should be planned from the beginning; it influences choices made during the design, development, testing, and deployment of the system.Ability to execute on multiple platforms.  Conformance to standards: architecture, design, coding, industrial

attributeList.name: operational
attributeList.description: Ability to execute within a specific environment and/or platform.

attributeList.name: recoverability
attributeList.description: Time to recover from issues.  Acceptable data loss from issue.  Backup frequencies/generations.

attributeList.name: reliability
attributeList.description: Mean time betweeen failures.  Mean time to recovery

attributeList.name: usability
attributeList.description: Factors that constitute the capacity of the software to be understood, learned, and used by intended users

attributeList.name: database design
attributeList.description: does this sentence currently imply or explicitly define database design?
